item.title: Employees Arrested Over Alleged Theft of Chip Tech for Apple A20 Chip
item.description: Several current and former TSMC employees have been accused of stealing proprietary information related to the company’s 2-nanometer chip process, which is expected to debut in Apple’s A20 chip for th
